answers.answer: For me you looks like diabetes.first you check your fasting blood sugar and consult with Medical specialist
No am not diabetic, I have looked after my son and my husband for nearly 20 years, both who suffer from category 1 diabetes, I would know if it was that.

question: I have very sore souls of my feet when standing or walking, my balance isnt as good as it was, my upper leg muscles are both sore and weak and I have pain in my lower back, and my doctor hasnt been of much help, just giving me painkillers, I would really like to know why I feel like this and if there is anything I can do to help, I try to stay as active as I can but it doesnt help.
title: General Health - undiagnosed symptoms
